snippet: Senator John McCain said he would favor sending combat air controllers into Iraq to help identify airstrike targets and expand the operation into Syria.
lead_paragraph: Senator John McCain said he would favor sending combat air controllers into Iraq to help identify airstrike targets and expand the operation into Syria.

headline.main: McCain Says Limited U.S. Strikes on Militants in Iraq Are Not Enough
